response.overview: An alien race threatens the existence of humanity. Soldiers, with the help of a pyrimad-like object called The Traveler, must use their powers (called Light) to take back Earth and regain strength. Follow a soldier named Tyler Becker, a private trained in England who is transferred to Russia. He will fight the aliens that threaten his homeworld as he faces the horrors of the dark world of war.
response.title: Destiny
